Reviews.Title: “A jewel right in the centre of Rome”

Reviews.Content: wonderful stay location bend river vatican walking distance sites tourist bus excellent restaurants close service friendly breakfast service bit unreliable times breakfast breakfast delivered inroom comprehensive juice wide variety bacon egg hot ham cheese cereals bread buns croissants jams excellent free coffee machine day bit dark inevitable historic building fairly narrow street highly recommendable
